categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ardray was a Mirialan male Jedi Master who led a detachment of Jedi and House Organa soldiers to the Elysium on the planet Alderaan, where they protected a number of Padawans studying there. However, Ardray and the Padawans were massacred by Imperial forces, who planted evidence framing House Ulgo for the murders.
